title: Dakara Boku wa, H ga Dekinai.: Mie Sugi! Mizugi Contest
alternative_title: So, I Can't Play H! Episode 13, だから僕は、Ｈができない 。 見えすぎ! 水着コンテスト
description: With their school's pool opening the next day, Iria schemes up the idea to hold a swimsuit contest. With Lisara, Mina, Quele, and Iria herself all participating in the event.
